subject: Make taskmanager a bit less dependent of ecore_x.
commitMessage:
Make taskmanager a bit less dependent of ecore_x.

Change-Id: I931b3a519939d6a6a4d2de37607b1bbd7d5cc5b0
Signed-off-by: Leandro Dorileo <leandro.maciel.dorileo@intel.com>
Signed-off-by: Fabio Mello <fabio.mello@intel.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

In the Spec file the line:
BuildRequires:  pkgconfig(utilX)

Should be remove.

Patch Set 2:

I made some improvements on this patch, removing some unnecessary ecore_x code and replacing some utilX functions with compatible efl_util functions.

Unfortunately, remove the utilX dependence is not possible, since we still have some X dependences in this package.

I think this patch could be integrated since it does what it promises. And the full extraction of ecore_x and utilX could be made by who is managing the wayland port.

subject: utilx: get rid of utilx
commitMessage:
utilx: get rid of utilx

Make use of efl_util and leave some conditionally built areas for
ecore_x and wayland support.

Change-Id: I51e6239a8e3918603cae660e931902bfd5272342
Signed-off-by: Leandro Dorileo <leandro.maciel.dorileo@intel.com>
